{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Google |model = Chromecast |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = H2G2-42 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = media streamer, computer-on-a-stick |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = A4RH2G2-42 |icid = 10395A-H2G242 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88DE3005;88DE3005-A1; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 (v7) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MT29F16G08CBACA; |flash1size = 2 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = D0:E7:82, F8:8F:CA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.85 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI out |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = ChromecastXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Chromecast[0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Flextronics |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/17/2013 |estreldate = 08/07/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 811571013579 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00DR0PDNE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-NH387 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8787; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :See also FCC ID: {{FCC.io|A4RH2G2-2A}} (new revision?)
Before configuration, the device broadcasts an SSID w/ a format of ''ChromecastXXXX'' :(''XXXX'' being a 4-digit number) w/ a F8:8F:CA (''Google Fiber'') OUI. :After setup, the device seems to use a D0:E7:82 ([[AzureWave]]) OUI.
Per the FCC test report... *the manufacturer is noted as ''Flextronics International LTD'' *the product name is noted as ''H840 DEVICE'' *the device is single-stream 802.11b/g/n capable :[[AzureWave]] ''AW-NH387L'' (QFN) 1T1R 802.11bgn [http://www.azurewave.com/product_AW-NH387_1.asp PPage] :Inverted F Antenna (IFA) (1.9dBi gain) on the PCB *the device takes power via a standard USB Female Micro-B port.
The power adapter is specified as a... *'''GPN''' SSW-2222US (120-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz -> 5VDC) :[http://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=262096&st=5340 this charger appears to have been used with ''Motorola'' phones] :([http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2076590 photos on xda-developers.com's forums]) :100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.2A -> 5.1VDC 850mA, w/ USB (Female A) connector :[http://www.raspberrypi.org/phpBB3/viewtopic.php?t=39371&p=324974 standard USB charger w/ 850mA power output]
===Additional specifications=== Additional specifications, per '''Google''''s product page, follow... *Dimensions (L x W x H): [[Dimensions::72 mm x 35 mm x 12 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::34 g]]
==Links of Interest== [https://play.google.com/store/devices/details?id=chromecast Product page]
{{WPLink|Chromecast}}
===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/7186/google-chromecast-review-an-awesome-35-hdmi-dongle On '''AnandTech'''] <!-- nice [https://www.tindie.com/products/FriedCircuits/usb-tester-oled-backpack-bundle/ USB power consumption meter] --> *[http://www.flatpanelshd.com/review.php?subaction=showfull&id=1376286082 On '''FlatpanelsHD''']
===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.gtvhacker.com/index.php/Google_Chromecast On the '''GTVHacker Wiki''']
===External links=== *[http://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Chromecast+Teardown/16069/1 Teardown on '''iFixit'''] :"H840 REV 3.30" is silkscreened on the board. :[[Marvell]] 88DE3005 (DE3005-A1, [https://origin-www.marvell.com/digital-entertainment/armada-1500-mini/index.jsp ''ARMADA'' 1500-mini]) SoC :''Micron'' MT29F16G08CBACA 16Gb (2GB) NAND :''Micron'' MT41K256M16HA-125:E 4Gb (512MB) DDR3 RAM (FBGA code D9PXV) :USB Female Micro-B power connector *[http://chromecastdev.com/ccdev/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=7 Thread w/ HW details on '''Chromecastdev.com'''] (FCC photos mirrored) :"H840 REV 3.10" appears to be silkscreened on the board. :[[Marvell]] 88DE3005-A1 (DE3005-A1) SoC :[https://origin-www.marvell.com/digital-entertainment/assets/armada_1000_pb.pdf Product brief for the DE3010] :''ARMADA'' 1000, dual Sheeva cores, [http://blog.gtvhacker.com/2013/chromecast-exploiting-the-newest-device-by-google/ the DE3005 uses a single core] :''Micron'' MT29F16G08CBACA 16Gb (2GB) NAND :''Micron'' MT41K256M16HA-125:E 4Gb (512MB) DDR3 RAM (FBGA code D9PXV) :Seems to have been code named ''Eureka''
[[Category:English Documentation]]
